name: Osprey Salida 8 Pack - Women's
description: Eough space for the essentials to hit the trails. It includes a Hydraulics LT 2.5L hydration reservoir that rides in its own dedicated compartment to make refills a snap and protect your gear from accidental spills. Attachments for a standard or full-face helmet and interior tool organizer slots, in case anything goes wrong.Foam back panel channels airflow while keeping the load close to your body for stability.Shoulder straps and back panel have a breathable mesh overlay and soft edges.Removable webbing waistbelt.Deep zippered opening gives you easy access.Front shove-it pocket lets you stash extra layers.Internal pocket protects sunnies or electronics.Hydration compartment with quick-connect attachment for easy filling.Magnetic clip keeps the bite valve tethered.Low-profile helmet carrier has straps for full-face helmets.Loop for a blinky light.Women's specific design has shoulder straps that are shaped to accommodate curves and a shorter torso length.
